title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.18 - Acute care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.18 - Acute care

State Regulations

Inpatient general routine care provided to patients who
are in an acute phase of illness, but not to the degree which requires the
concentrated and continuous observation and care provided in the intensive care
units of an institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
